com.hedera.hashgraph.identity.hcs.did

Class HcsDidTransaction

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hedera.hashgraph.identity.hcs.MessageTransaction<HcsDidMessage>
      • com.hedera.hashgraph.identity.hcs.did.HcsDidTransaction

  • public class HcsDidTransaction
extends MessageTransaction<HcsDidMessage>
    The DID document creation, update or deletion transaction. Builds a correct HcsDidMessage and send it to HCS DID topic.
